attributes.action: Let Alcohol Be Legal In School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We find kids learn more when they are drunk or typsy. So us as parents are responsible for stopping there education. A Glass Of vodka in the morning can wake a child up and increase there brain power by  at least 30%. Our aim is too put an alcohol bar in every dining hall across the UK!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
